summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 47, Supplemental Plat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley between Summit Avenue and Belmont Avenue, from John Street to Thomas Street, by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 91764 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
